# Aaron Dsilva - Senior Full Stack Developer

> Healthcare tech, AI integration, and security compliance. I build systems that serve 100+ hospitals with full HIPAA, SOC2, and ISO 27001 compliance.

I'm a senior full-stack developer with 7 years of experience building secure healthcare systems across the US, Europe, UAE, and India. I specialize in the intersection of healthcare tech, AI integration, and security compliance.

## About

- [Home](/): Portfolio overview, current projects, and tech stack
- [Blog](/blog): Technical articles on healthcare tech, AWS, AI/ML, and compliance

## Technical Blog

Articles on healthcare tech, AWS, AI/ML, and compliance from real production experience.

### AI & LLM Integration

- [MCP: Model Context Protocol Guide](/blog/mcp-model-context-protocol): Building AI integrations with MCP servers
- [RAG in Healthcare](/blog/rag-in-healthcare): Compliant RAG pipelines for healthcare systems

### AWS & Cloud

- [AWS Cost Optimization ($1M Saved)](/blog/aws-cost-optimization-1m-saved): Real case study of 33% cost reduction
- [Serverless Healthcare on AWS](/blog/serverless-healthcare-aws): HIPAA-compliant serverless architecture

### Healthcare Compliance

- [HIPAA for Developers](/blog/hipaa-for-developers): Technical guide to HIPAA compliance
- [SOC2 vs HIPAA vs ISO 27001](/blog/soc2-vs-hipaa-vs-iso27001): Compliance framework comparison
- [API Security for Healthcare](/blog/api-security-healthcare-auth-vulnerable): Beyond basic authentication

### Mobile Development

- [React Native vs Flutter for Healthcare](/blog/react-native-vs-flutter-healthcare-apps): Real comparison from shipping both

### Enterprise Architecture

- [TOGAF for Healthcare](/blog/togaf-without-bureaucracy-healthcare-ea): Practical enterprise architecture

### Security

- [The Cost of Skipping Security](/blog/security-debt-cost): Lessons from fixing security debt

## Expertise

- **Languages**: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Dart
- **Frameworks**: React Native, Flutter, Node.js, Flask, Laravel, Rails
- **Cloud**: AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, Aurora, S3, CloudFront)
- **Compliance**: HIPAA, SOC2, ISO 27001, GDPR
- **AI/ML**: RAG pipelines, LLM integration, MCP servers
- **Healthcare**: HL7 FHIR, EHR integrations, medical imaging
